    • makeBannerData

      public static void makeBannerData​(AbstractReport report, ReportHeaderCol headerCol, org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFRow row, java.lang.Integer colIndex, org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.CellStyle labelStyle, org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.CellStyle dataStyle) throws java.lang.Exception
      Creates left/right side data for banner rows in an Excel-formatted report
      Parameters:
      report - Any ANSI report
      headerCol - The label/data definition
      row - Which row in the banner are we working with
      colIndex - Which column in the banner are we working with
      labelStyle - How to format the label
      dataStyle - How to format the data
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Something bad happened
